about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes
  • Long-range Empire frigate “Gungnir”
  • Thermal weapon “Le Claire”.
  • Active module “TY-7 optics system”.
  • Active module “Barrier blast”.

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • EM Scattering Field.
  • Reverse Thruster.
  • Tachyon Charge.
  • Weapon Overcharge.
  • Crystal Plates.
  • ‘Horizon’ Module.
  • Armor-Plated Hull.

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

The newest long-range frigate Gungnir just left Sparta shipyard. With excellent characteristics, it has become a great addition to the smaller Imperial fleet.

As we know, Spartan scientists studied the ruins of the Warden outpost in the Felony system for a long time. It was the secret projects of the Order of Emperor that allowed them to complete the development in the shortest possible time. One of the features of Gungnir was the ability to land on various objects for the purpose of firing its disintegrator. This powerful weapon shoots at the target twice and leaves no chance of survival.

When purchasing multiple DLCs, the time for premium licenses is cumulative.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes
  • Long-range Empire frigate “Gungnir”
  • Thermal weapon “Le Claire”.
  • Active module “TY-7 optics system”.
  • Active module “Barrier blast”.

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • EM Scattering Field.
  • Reverse Thruster.
  • Tachyon Charge.
  • Weapon Overcharge.
  • Crystal Plates.
  • ‘Horizon’ Module.
  • Armor-Plated Hull.

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

The newest long-range frigate Gungnir just left Sparta shipyard. With excellent characteristics, it has become a great addition to the smaller Imperial fleet.

As we know, Spartan scientists studied the ruins of the Warden outpost in the Felony system for a long time. It was the secret projects of the Order of Emperor that allowed them to complete the development in the shortest possible time. One of the features of Gungnir was the ability to land on various objects for the purpose of firing its disintegrator. This powerful weapon shoots at the target twice and leaves no chance of survival.

When purchasing multiple DLCs, the time for premium licenses is cumulative.
name: Star Conflict: Gungnir. Deluxe Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
